name: B to Bazinga, or: The Bag Bag Theories
name_original: B to Bazinga, or: The Bag Bag Theories
description:
I saw about five minutes of The Big Bang Theory and I think this about covers it. Based on this tweet.

Your favourite characters! Howard! Leonard! Raj! Penny! Only the finest in taste policing.

Can you beat the world record of 107 bazinga?
(You can't).

WASD to move.

Mouse to look.

The letter 'i' to invert the mouse.

'B' to bazinga.

See paratext for further instructions.

Drink pairing: Vanilla schnapps
Music pairing: Babylon 5 theme.
Actual music by 8 Bit Universe.
Colour scheme: 70s photo.
Font: roboto slab.
